name: Darkist
description:
Have you ever wondered having  a nightmare where you are in a dark place?

Can you escape the darkness? Or will you stay in the dark forever?

Take a place in a short adventure to the darker world and see unexpected twist.

Controls:

W, S, A , D - Movements

LeftMouse - click

SK7LL

( This Game is made in just 2 Days! )
